name: Project Völsunga
description:
This is an early build of Wulflings: A Legend of the North, The build is made from Unity Engine 2019 LTS, But I have made a decision to continue with this project with Unreal Engine 4 since I have recently shifted all my game dev works to UE4 Ecosystem. Now given the main idea of the game isn't  a subject to change but everything else is. Stay tuned for more updates.

Tips/Instructions to play around with this build.

  •  8 - Directional Movement (WASD).
  • Tab to Dash.
  • Hold C to crouch
  • E to Holster Bow, Right Mouse Click to
  •  Space to Jump
  • Tab + Space to Dash in the air.
  • When standing on a runestone, Press P to save the game.

Stay tuned for more updates.
